name: WaterSandpit
description:
I used NVIDIA FleX
This is a water and sandpit simulator.
It is soft which dig sand with mouse and play with running water.

NVIDIA FleXを利用した
水と砂場シミュレーターです。
マウスで砂を掘ったりして水を流して遊ぶソフトです。

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
RECOMMENDED:
OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce 1060 with 1GB of video RAM
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 200MB available space
Sound Card: DirectX compatible
